from kokoro_tts import convert_text_to_audio
import sys

text = ''Welcome to the BMAD AI video generator. This is a sample of the voice you have selected.''
voice = ''af_nova''
output = ''ai-video-generator/.cache/audio/previews/sophia.mp3''

print(f''Generating {output}...'')
with open(''temp_preview.txt'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    f.write(text)
    
convert_text_to_audio(''temp_preview.txt'', output, voice=voice, format=''mp3'')
print(f''âœ“ Generated {output}'')
")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement Export UI & Download Workflow (Story 5.5)

Adds the Export page displaying completed videos with download options:
- Export page route at /projects/[id]/export
- Video player with native HTML5 controls
- Thumbnail preview with download button
- Video download with sanitized filename
- Metadata display (duration, size, resolution, topic, scenes)
- Assembly progress indicator while processing
- Navigation to create new video or back to curation
- Export API endpoint returning video metadata

Components created:
- ExportClient: Main export page client component
- VideoDownload: Primary video download button
- ThumbnailPreview: Thumbnail display with download
- ExportSummary: Video metadata display
- AssemblyProgress: Progress indicator for assembly

API:
- GET /api/projects/[id]/export - Returns export metadata

Implements: FR-7.06, FR-8.05
Completes: Epic 5 - Video Assembly & Output

Bash("C:\\Users\\revenant\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python312\\python.exe" -c "
import asyncio
import httpx
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import re

async def test_dvids_search\(\):
    queries = [''training'', ''army'', ''aircraft'', ''navy'']
    
    async with httpx.AsyncClient\(\) as client:
        for query in queries:
            url = f''https://www.dvidshub.net/video/?search={query}''
            print\(f''\\n=== Query: {query} ===''\)
            print\(f''URL: {url}''\)
            
            try:
                response = await client.get\(url, timeout=30\)
                soup = BeautifulSoup\(response.text, ''html.parser''\)
                
                video_links = soup.find_all\(''a'', href=re.compile\(r''/video/\\d+''\)\)
                print\(f''Found {len\(video_links\)} video links''\)
                
                video_ids = set\(\)
                for link in video_links[:20]:
                    href = link.get\(''href''\)
                    match = re.search\(r''/video/\(\\d+\)'', href\)
                    if match:
                        video_ids.add\(match.group\(1\)\)
                
                print\(f''Unique video IDs: {sorted\(video_ids\)[:10]}''\)
                print\(f''Total unique: {len\(video_ids\)}''\)
                
            except Exception as e:
                print\(f''Error: {e}''\)

asyncio.run\(test_dvids_search\(\)\)
")
